data.text:
Yesterday's 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, 
was a close one, wasn't it～!?
data.name: Sociable Young Man
data.processed:
<story>Yesterday's 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, 
<story>was a close one, wasn't it～!?

data.text: Rather than close, I'd say it was a valiant effort.
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed: <story>Rather than close, I'd say it was a valiant effort.

data.text:
Montjeu's finishing strength, that seriously isn't a joke! 
Who do you think could beat that!?
data.name: Sociable Young Man
data.processed:
<story>Montjeu's finishing strength, that seriously isn't a joke! 
<story>Who do you think could beat that!?

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
Well, in Japan, El Condor Pasa probably had the 
highest chance of doing that, without a doubt.
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed:
<story>Well, in Japan, El Condor Pasa probably had the 
<story>highest chance of doing that, without a doubt.

data.text:
You were always saying that, huh. 
El Condor Pasa is only #1 in Japan.
data.name: Sociable Young Man
data.processed:
<story>You were always saying that, huh. 
<story>El Condor Pasa is only #1 in Japan.

data.text:
But yeah, even though I already understood that, 
I guess things just aren't that easy――
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed:
<story>But yeah, even though I already understood that, 
<story>I guess things just aren't that easy――

data.text: I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed: <story>I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.

data.text: ……#1 in Japan is only……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……#1 in Japan is only……

data.text: Become! Japan's #1-～!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Become! Japan's #1-～!

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……!

data.text:
The week after the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 
would be the 『Kyoto Daishoten』――
data.processed:
<story>The week after the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 
<story>would be the 『Kyoto Daishoten』――

data.text:
In preparation for that race, 
Special Week's training was in full swing.
data.processed:
<story>In preparation for that race, 
<story>Special Week's training was in full swing.

data.text: Haa……Haa……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa……Haa……

data.text: Spe-san, are you okay……?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Spe-san, are you okay……?

data.text: Ah, ahaha……I just messed up my pacing.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah, ahaha……I just messed up my pacing.

data.text: ……should we take a break for now?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>……should we take a break for now?

data.text: No…… I'm fine. I just need to catch my breath……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>No…… I'm fine. I just need to catch my breath……

data.text:
She said that while smiling, maybe it was because she was out of 
breath, but her expression seemed stiff.
data.processed:
<story>She said that while smiling, maybe it was because she was out of 
<story>breath, but her expression seemed stiff.

data.text:
Probably because Kyoto's 2400m will be her first 
of that distance. While keeping the course in 
mind, focus on your pace and the distance.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Probably because Kyoto's 2400m will be her first 
<story>of that distance. While keeping the course in 
<story>mind, focus on your pace and the distance.

data.text:
Probably because Kyoto's 2400m will be her first 
of that distance. While keeping the course in 
mind, focus on your pace and the distance.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Probably because Kyoto's 2400m will be her first 
<story>of that distance. While keeping the course in 
<story>mind, focus on your pace and the distance.

data.text:
The 『Kyoto Daishoten』, let's stay focused as 
we prepare for autumn's G1s! Let's get one 
step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>The 『Kyoto Daishoten』, let's stay focused as 
<story>we prepare for autumn's G1s! Let's get one 
<story>step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text:
The 『Kyoto Daishoten』, let's stay focused as 
we prepare for autumn's G1s! Let's get one 
step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>The 『Kyoto Daishoten』, let's stay focused as 
<story>we prepare for autumn's G1s! Let's get one 
<story>step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text: "Japan's #1"……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>"Japan's #1"……

data.text: Become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and then what……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and then what……?

data.text: Spe……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Spe……?

data.text:
Oh, nothing……! 
I've calmed down a bit, so I'll go do one more lap.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Oh, nothing……! 
<story>I've calmed down a bit, so I'll go do one more lap.

data.text: (2400m……focus on pacing and the distance……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(2400m……focus on pacing and the distance……)

data.text:
(Win the 『Kyoto Daishoten』, stay focused, 
prepare for autumn's G1s……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(Win the 『Kyoto Daishoten』, stay focused, 
<story>prepare for autumn's G1s……)

data.text: (……And get one step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(……And get one step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"……)

data.text:
『Japan's El Condor Pasa, she was so close…… 
she was so very close but was passed at the end!』
data.name: TV Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『Japan's El Condor Pasa, she was so close…… 
<story>she was so very close but was passed at the end!』

data.text:
『This is the wall known as the world! 
El Condor Pasa is defeated and places 2nd!』
data.name: TV Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『This is the wall known as the world! 
<story>El Condor Pasa is defeated and places 2nd!』

data.text: (……Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", what does that even mean……?)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(……Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", what does that even mean……?)

data.text: (……A reason to run in races, what does that mean……?)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(……A reason to run in races, what does that mean……?)

data.text:
Autumn's stage approaches, and the Uma Musume that are at the 
center of attention have gathered. 『Kyoto Daishoten』 GII――
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Autumn's stage approaches, and the Uma Musume that are at the 
<story>center of attention have gathered. 『Kyoto Daishoten』 GII――

data.text:
The favorite is Special Week, along with her achievements 
in spring, she's garnered the support of many!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The favorite is Special Week, along with her achievements 
<story>in spring, she's garnered the support of many!

data.text:
Following on, second is Mejiro Bright, and third is TM Opera O, 
both of whom have G1 victories adding to their popularity!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Following on, second is Mejiro Bright, and third is TM Opera O, 
<story>both of whom have G1 victories adding to their popularity!

data.text:
However, don't take your eyes off this Uma Musume either! 
Starting in the summer, she's already made it to 4th in 
popularity, Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>However, don't take your eyes off this Uma Musume either! 
<story>Starting in the summer, she's already made it to 4th in 
<story>popularity, Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

data.text:
Finally, I've finally made it! 
A GII Race! The 『Kyoto Daishoten』!!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Finally, I've finally made it! 
<story>A GII Race! The 『Kyoto Daishoten』!!

data.text:
All this time I've had to just watch from behind, no matter how 
much I wanted to run, I could only imagine it……
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>All this time I've had to just watch from behind, no matter how 
<story>much I wanted to run, I could only imagine it……

data.text:
But today, I will run here! A race with several G1 Uma Musume, 
a race with everyone, me too――
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>But today, I will run here! A race with several G1 Uma Musume, 
<story>a race with everyone, me too――

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: ……! Spe-chan!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>……! Spe-chan!

data.text: Ah, Tsuru-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah, Tsuru-chan.

data.text:
Ehehe, they said Spe-chan is the favorite! 
You're really amazing, huh!?
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, they said Spe-chan is the favorite! 
<story>You're really amazing, huh!?

data.text:
But but! I'm in great condition! 
For the sake of this day, I've really given it my best!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>But but! I'm in great condition! 
<story>For the sake of this day, I've really given it my best!

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: Hm……? Spe-chan……?
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Hm……? Spe-chan……?

data.text: Ah, no. Tsuru-chan, you really did your best, huh?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah, no. Tsuru-chan, you really did your best, huh?

data.text: Ehehehe, yeah!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Ehehehe, yeah!

data.text:
You see, I'm a little proud of myself that I'm able to stand here. 
It took a really, really long time to make it here……
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>You see, I'm a little proud of myself that I'm able to stand here. 
<story>It took a really, really long time to make it here……

data.text:
……Alllright, show some spirit when you run, Tsuyoshi! 
I'll run my heart out with these G1 Uma Musume!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>……Alllright, show some spirit when you run, Tsuyoshi! 
<story>I'll run my heart out with these G1 Uma Musume!

data.text:
Spe-chan, come at me with everything you've got too! 
Show me what the Derby Uma Musume is made of!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, come at me with everything you've got too! 
<story>Show me what the Derby Uma Musume is made of!

data.text: Y-yeah……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Y-yeah……

data.text:
200m remain! Special's movements seem off! 
Special's movements seem off!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>200m remain! Special's movements seem off! 
<story>Special's movements seem off!

data.text: Haa……haa……kuu……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa……haa……kuu……!

data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>……!?

data.text: From the inside comes Mejiro Bright!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>From the inside comes Mejiro Bright!

data.text: TM Opera O also pushes forward!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>TM Opera O also pushes forward!

data.text: But in the lead is Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>But in the lead is Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

data.text:
This is late arrival of the "Golden Generation's" hidden weapon! 
The one to win the [Kyoto Daishoten] is Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>This is late arrival of the "Golden Generation's" hidden weapon! 
<story>The one to win the [Kyoto Daishoten] is Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

data.text: 2nd place was Mejiro Bright! 3rd was TM Opera O!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>2nd place was Mejiro Bright! 3rd was TM Opera O!

data.text:
The favorite, Special Week, this is the first time she hasn't 
been registered on the board!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The favorite, Special Week, this is the first time she hasn't 
<story>been registered on the board!

data.text: Haa……haa……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa……haa……

data.text: Haa……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa……

data.text: Spe-chan……
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Spe-chan……
